alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 12:23AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lowndes County through 115 AM EDT... At 1223 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Quitman, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, I-75 At Exit 5, Twin Lakes, Clyattville, I-75 At Exit 11, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou and Naylor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
